name: ハクスラダンジョンⅢ
description:
【RPG Tool】 RPG Maker MZ
【Genre】 Huxla Command RPG
【Play time】20〜100 hours or more

Over 50,000 downloads in total!
The latest in Chameleon's flagship "Huxla Dungeon" series is now available for the first time in 3 years!

Character make-up (more than 500 face glamour) + Occupation selection (20 occupations)
Enchantment synthesis
Sub-events
A New Game with a Little Strength
Collectors will love the Armor Book and more!

For Huxla lovers
We aimed to create a game that would make people say, "This is just the kind of game I want to play.

We have also included a "tutorial" in this game to help newcomers to the Huxla world.
We hope that beginners of Huxla will also pick up this game.

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we do!
